parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of sketch relations for this sketch segment

title: ISketchSegment.IGetRelations
description: Gets the sketch relations for this sketch segment.

parameters.name: Count
parameters.description: Number of sketch relations for this sketch segment

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of sketch relations for this sketch segment VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
ISketchSegment::GetRelationsCount
to get the value for Count.
